text: Dennis Victor Crookes (born 18 June 1931) is a former South African cricketer and businessman who played first-class cricket for Cambridge University in 1953 and 1954. Dennis Crookes was educated at Michaelhouse in Natal and Jesus College, Oxford.Wisden 1954, p. 286. After his studies at Oxford he returned to Natal, where he worked for CG Smith Sugar later Illovo Sugar, and served the family sugar-growing company Crookes Brothers as chairman from 1993 to 1998. ==References== ==External links== * * Dennis Crookes at Cricket Archive Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:People from Berea District Category:Alumni of Michaelhouse Category:Alumni of Jesus College, Oxford Category:South African cricketers Category:Cambridge University cricketers Category:South African businesspeople
title: Dennis Crookes
